scanner.help_message:
I18n Text Scanner

Usage: node i18ntk-scanner.js [options]

Options:
  --source-dir <dir>     Source directory to scan (default: ./src)
  --output <file>        Output file for scan results (default: ./i18ntk-scanner-report.json)
  --framework <name>     Framework to target (react, vue, angular, vanilla)
  --patterns <patterns>  Custom regex patterns (comma-separated)
  --include-tests        Include test files in scan
  --exclude-dirs <dirs>  Directories to exclude (comma-separated)
  --help                Show this help

Examples:
  node i18ntk-scanner.js --source-dir=./src --framework=react
  node i18ntk-scanner.js --patterns 'console.log\((.*?)\)' --include-tests
  node i18ntk-scanner.js --output=./scan-results.json

help_options.source_dir: Source directory to scan for i18n issues
help_options.output_dir: Directory for scan reports and results
help_options.patterns: Custom regex patterns for text detection
help_options.exclude: File patterns to exclude from scanning
help_options.min_length: Minimum text length to consider for translation
help_options.max_length: Maximum text length to consider for translation
help_options.include_tests: Include test files in the scanning process

welcome.title: 🎯 Welcome to the Text Scanner!
welcome.description: This tool scans your source code for hardcoded English text that may need translation.

frameworkPrompt.title: 🎯 Select Framework
frameworkPrompt.available: Available frameworks: react, vue, angular, vanilla
frameworkPrompt.description: Enter the framework type (or press Enter for auto-detection):

directoryPrompt.description: Enter the directory to scan (or press Enter for current):

fixer.help_message:
I18n Translation Fixer

Usage: node i18ntk-fixer.js [options]

Options:
  --source-dir <dir>     Source directory to scan (default: ./locales)
  --languages <langs>    Comma separated list of languages to fix
  --markers <markers>    Comma separated markers to treat as untranslated
  --no-backup           Skip automatic backup creation
  --help                Show this help

Examples:
  node i18ntk-fixer.js --languages de,fr
  node i18ntk-fixer.js --source-dir=./locales --markers NOT_TRANSLATED
  node i18ntk-fixer.js --no-backup
fixer.reviewReport: Please review the report before proceeding.
fixer.noIssues: ✅ No issues found. All translations are complete.
fixer.moreIssues: ... and {count} more issues. Check the report file for complete details.

fixer.nonInteractiveMode: ⚡ Non-interactive mode detected - applying fixes automatically...

analyze.help_message:
I18n Translation Analyzer

Usage: node i18ntk-analyze.js [options]

Options:
  --source-dir <dir>     Source directory to scan (default: ./src)
  --i18n-dir <dir>       I18n directory (default: ./src/locales)
  --output-report        Generate detailed report
  --output-dir <dir>     Output directory for reports (default: ./reports)
  --help                 Show this help

Examples:
  node i18ntk-analyze.js --output-report
  node i18ntk-analyze.js --source-dir=./app --i18n-dir=./locales
  node i18ntk-analyze.js --output-dir=./analysis --output-report
analyze.add_missing_translations: 💡 Add missing translations to improve coverage.
analyze.remove_unused_translations: 💡 Remove unused translations to keep your project clean.
analyze.review_analysis_results: 1. Review the analysis results in the console or generated report.
analyze.add_or_remove_translations: 3. Add missing translations or remove unused ones.

help.title: Settings Help
help.navigation1: 1. General Settings - Configure UI language, theme, and basic preferences
help.navigation2: 2. Directory Settings - Set source and output directories for translation files
help.navigation3: 3. Processing Settings - Configure batch size, concurrency, and performance options
help.navigation4: 4. Advanced Settings - Access validation, logging, and expert configuration options
help.categoryUI: • UI Settings: Interface language, color theme, and display preferences
help.categoryDirectory: • Directory Settings: Source files location and output report directories
help.categoryProcessing: • Processing Settings: Batch processing, file limits, and performance tuning
help.categoryAdvanced: • Advanced Settings: Debug mode, audit logging, and security options
help.envVar1: • I18N_SOURCE_DIR: Override default source directory path
help.envVar2: • I18N_OUTPUT_DIR: Override default output directory path
help.cliUsage1: • npx i18ntk --settings: Open interactive settings menu
help.cliUsage2: • npx i18ntk --settings --lang de: Open settings in German
help.cliUsage3: • npx i18ntk --reset-settings: Reset all settings to defaults
help.navigation: Use number keys to select options, 'b' to go back
help.editing: Enter new values when prompted, or press Enter to keep current
help.saving: Use 's' to save changes before quitting
help.reset: Use option 7 to reset all settings to defaults

summary.helpDescription: Analyzes the i18n folder structure and generates a comprehensive summary report including key statistics, file structure analysis, and validation checks.

testConsoleI18n.recommendation_1: 1. Replace hardcoded strings with i18n.t() calls.
testConsoleI18n.recommendation_2: 2. Add new keys to the relevant translation JSON files.
testConsoleI18n.recommendation_3: 3. Ensure all console messages are user-facing and require translation.
testConsoleI18n.recommendation_4: 4. Use template literals or string concatenation for dynamic messages, passing variables to i18n.t().

testConsoleI18n.script_description_line2: and checks if they're using the translation system.
